389 K026 RN 383 1-224a1-b7212b-213b4(ph 484-485)24b6f.: rGyud gyi rgyal po gsang ba’i yang gsang ba rang bzhin gyis gsang ba || || rdzogs s+ho || rgya gar gyi mkhan po Rin chen rdo rje dang | bod gyi lo tsa ba Sha kya ye shes kyis sgyurd cing zhus te | gtan la ’phab pa’o || || ༄ || || Dam tshig chen po’i rgyud ’dir ’ong ma yin || refs/1_Kanjur/
391 K026 RN 383 2-424b7-26b3216a3-219a2(ph 485-487)24b7: ༄|| || rgya gar skad du || Shri ma ha pa la tan tra na ma || bod skad du || dPal sTobs che'i rgyud ces bya ba || 26b2f: dPal sTobs po che'i rgyud las || brung ba'i ’khor lo ’i le’u ste gsum pa’o || || rdzogs s+ho || || rgya gar gyi mkhan po Rad na badzra gang | bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong Shag kya ye shes kyis sgyurd cing zhus pa || || ༄ Ye shes gsang ba’i rgyud ’dir ’og ma yin | refs/1_Kanjur/

? K040 RN 294+365+386: X rgyud Cha (5) 201b1-309a5; Na 1b1-87b7; O vol. Kha རྒྱུད་ཐམས་ཅད་ཀྱི་གླེང་གཞི་དང་གསང་ཆེན་དཔལ་ཀུན་ཏུ་ཁ་སྦྱོར་ལས་བྱུང་བ། * Sarvatantrasyanidāna-mahāguhya Śrīsampuṭa (tantrarāja) 1-212(ph 386.494-495)12a4: dpal kun tu kha sbyor las byung ba las | byang chub kyi sems kyi dbang bskur ba ste | brtag pa 2, rab tu byed pa 1 3-2822-34(ph 365.204-217)22b6: rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi dang gsang chen | dpal kun tu kha sbyor las byung ba las | brtag pa’i rgyal po gsum pa | rdz.;24a5: [dpal] kun tu kha sbyor las byung ba las | ngag dang yi ge’i bsda ste | brtag p 4, rab tu byed pa 1;24b3: … brtag pa 4, rab tu byed pa 2;25b5: … brtag pa 4, rab tu byed pa 3;etcetc 29-463[8]-46(ph 365.218x-227) 47-5057-59(ph 158-161)58a5f.: rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi dang gsang chen dpal kun tu kha sbyor las byung ba las | las thams cad bsam gtan 'byung ba zhes bya ba | brtag pa'i rgyal po 759a3f.: dpal kun tu kha sbyor las byung ba las | brtag pa 8, rab tu byed pa 1 51-5665-69(ph 161x-167)67b3f.: rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi dang gsang chen dpal kun tu kha sbyor las byung ba las |68a6: kun tu kha sbyor las byung ba las | slob dpon dang phyag rgya byin brlabs pa ste | brtag pa 10 pa'i rab tu byed pa ste 1cf. D 1199 (in all Tanjurs): sarba tan+t+ra s+ya ni dA na ma hA gu h+ya shri sam+pu ta tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma TI kA rat+na mA la nA ma rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi dang gsang chen dpal kun du kha sbyor zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgya cher bshad pa rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba refs/1_Kanjur/
